RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: predator superstar
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] might as well have been a god, for all the worship [PAWN_pronoun] received, all the prey sacrificed to [PAWN_objective], and all the power [PAWN_pronoun] flexed. [PAWN_possessive] name and face were inescapable, plastered on every other screen and advert. If [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to add you to [PAWN_possessive] body, for a while or forever, [PAWN_pronoun] didnt even have to ask--but who would say no?

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: voracious vacationer
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] didnt care to get a job, instead whittling away at [PAWN_possessive] comfortable pile of savings by touring the galaxy. [PAWN_pronoun] loves nothing more than to see new sights, breathe new air, and above all else, get acquainted with the flavor of the locals. Theres nothing quite like relaxing on a beach with a full belly.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: predatory phagologist
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a phagologist, [PAWN_nameDef] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to studying vore: where it comes from, how it develops and works, and its effects on society. [PAWN_nameDef] has a particularly hands-on approach, taking particular pleasure in testing hypotheses on [PAWN_objective]self, with the help of willing and disposable volunteers. It is a challenge to fit into [PAWN_possessive] labcoat sometimes, though.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: full-belly-dancer
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the art of dancing with a full belly for the enjoyment of a private audience. They would watch [PAWN_objective] sway and twirl and counterbalance as [PAWN_possessive] prey kicked about.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: voracious bodybuilder
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bodybuilder, supplementing [PAWN_possessive] extensive workout routine with the handy packs of protein milling about the gym around [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] always seemed to spend more time burning off fat than toning [PAWN_possessive] muscles, though...

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: belly-filling barfly
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] went to a different bar every night, on the hunt for one-night-stands [PAWN_pronoun] could bring back to [PAWN_possessive] hotel room. At the end of the night, [PAWN_nameDef] would gulp down [PAWN_possessive] partner, whether they asked to be eaten or not, and leave a mess in the hotel rooms bathroom come morning. [PAWN_nameDef] did learn a thing or two about mixed drinks and dart-throwing in the process, though.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: digestion art model
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional artists model, hired to swallow down some belly-stuffer and digest them in front of an artist, or even a crowd of art students, so that they could then portray the predators body in the process of digestion, or a before-and-after of the distribution of body fat. [PAWN_nameDef] picked up a few art techniques from the conversations going on around [PAWN_objective].

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: easygoing call-churner
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a vore prostitute--a call-pred, but a specific kind of call-pred known as a call-churner--who allowed those with the money and the death-wish/reformation-access to purchase a gurgling on top of the vore. [PAWN_nameDef], in particular, offered all of [PAWN_possessive] holes up for [PAWN_possessive] clients to melt away in, which left [PAWN_objective] very busy and very accustomed to negotiating.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: roleplaying call-churner
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a vore prostitute--a call-pred, but a specific kind of call-pred known as a call-churner--who allowed those with the money and the death-wish/reformation-access to purchase a gurgling on top of the vore. [PAWN_nameDef] went beyond mere digestion, however, seeking clients who wanted to be legitimately gurgled, under non-consensual circumstances, by a fearsome predator, but who wanted a degree of control in how that situation was actually staged out. [PAWN_pronoun] even picked up a few practical melee techniques, for those who wanted to give a real struggle.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: ravenous ritual dancer
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a powerful psychic, tasked with performing a sacred rite for [PAWN_possessive] people in which [PAWN_pronoun] had to dance through the entire process of vore, from ingestion to disposal, surrounded by clouds of incense. [PAWN_possessive] people sacrificed themselves willingly to [PAWN_possessive] body, as merely feeding normal food to [PAWN_objective] was a taboo; preparing [PAWN_possessive] own food was downright blasphemous.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: vorewear model
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A vorewear designer needs a model for their designs. Thats where [PAWN_nameDef] comes in. [PAWN_pronoun] would shunt a belly-stuffer wherever one was needed, before walking onto the runway and showing off [PAWN_possessive] predatory style. Of course, its a cutthroat industry and models dont always get along, so [PAWN_nameDef] had to be quicker of wit and maw than your typical non-vore model.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: digestive V-streamer
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While the webnet was oversaturated with vanilla porn and sketchy vorno startups, [PAWN_nameDef] found a lucrative niche in indie vore streaming. [PAWN_pronoun] started small, with maybe a household object or a pet, but finally made a splash when [PAWN_pronoun] devoured a special guest on stream, leaving the camera on, all the way through digestion, while [PAWN_pronoun] drifted off in [PAWN_possessive] chair.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: vrestling ass
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional vrestler, a subgenre of wrestling that incorporates vore into its flashy routines and staged outcomes. [PAWN_pronoun] played an ass (equivalent to a heel), whom the fans would boo and hiss at as [PAWN_pronoun] sent another underperforming face to [PAWN_possessive] belly.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: vrestling mouth
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional vrestler, a subgenre of wrestling that incorporates vore into its flashy routines and staged outcomes. [PAWN_pronoun] played a mouth (equivalent to a face) and the fans went wild whenever [PAWN_pronoun] permanently retired that seasons ass (at least, until the ass came back, depending on the writing).

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: covert bellavore
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a covert operator specializing in bellavory. There arent any bodies, dead or unconscious, for the guards to stumble across if you bring the obstacles you remove with you, and what better place to stow them than inside?

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: biohazard disposal officer
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A plague hit [PAWN_nameDef]s home and tore through the population. Few survived, and bodies were contagious even after death. [PAWN_nameDef], however, developed immunity. As such, [PAWN_pronoun] was enlisted to process those whose prognosis was bleak, to save up medical supplies. They would be told they were entering a living quarantine unit, only to be digested and safely disposed of. There were ever so many doomed in need of disposal.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: gluttonous gladiator
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a favorite in the colosseum, fighting for fame and glory instead of freedom. While other gladiators might conclude their fights by spilling guts or cutting off heads, [PAWN_nameDef] had [PAWN_possessive] own way of ending worn-down foes: a lengthy, elaborate vore routine that showed off both partys finer angles and left the audience eager, desperate to know if the loser would be gurgled or spared.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: false god
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had it pretty good as a charlatan, posing as a deity in exchange for regular sacrifices. While [PAWN_possessive] followers knew what was up, [PAWN_nameDef] made for a convenient way to get rid of excess captives, and [PAWN_pronoun] so desperately demanded absurd luxury that [PAWN_pronoun] voluntarily helped research useful technologies (if in a rather condescending manner).

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: gluttonous libertine
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A lover of fine society and finer dining, [PAWN_nameDef] made a name for [PAWN_objective]self challenging [PAWN_possessive] competitors over the hand of those [PAWN_pronoun] coveted, only to later devour that plaything after the affair ran its course. Often, the news that so-and-so had been first stripped of all dignity and then churned, provoked even flashier fights than the initial duel, for which [PAWN_nameDef] has been declared persona-non-grata in many a city.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: pred-at-arms
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tanky medieval bellavore, marching into battle fully-armored and empty-bellied. Preds-at-arms specialize in overwhelming and intimidating poorly-trained and ill-equipped soldiers, as well as capturing or melting through heavily-armored targets. All that plate does nothing against the scouring of acids and enzymes, after all.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: predacious prostitute
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was just a normal sex-prostitute, neither a call-pred nor call-prey. However, in case someone tried to take advantage of [PAWN_objective] (or was willing to pay extra for it), [PAWN_pronoun] wasnt opposed to demonstrating some vore from time to time, so long as [PAWN_pronoun] could maintain [PAWN_possessive] figure.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: living space heater
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]s tribe lived in a tundra where enemies were many and firewood was scarce. For the good of [PAWN_possessive] people, [PAWN_pronoun] forwent the scant vegetables and grains they grew and foraged, in favor of all the live, hostile prey that came a-raiding. As it turns out, digesting a bunch of people at once can keep an entire lodge nice and cozy, even in the middle of a blizzard.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: burglar-eating butler
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a very loyal servant. Not only did [PAWN_pronoun] clean and cook; [PAWN_pronoun] was also an attack dog who devoured [PAWN_possessive] share of burglars, intruders, and unwanted guests.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: voreserker
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] raided settlements as a bellavorous berserker. [PAWN_pronoun] would charge into battle, bits-out, hopped up on natural narcotics, and hands empty, pushing, grabbing, and shoving [PAWN_possessive] enemies into whatever orifice [PAWN_pronoun] had ready for them. Afterwards, [PAWN_nameDef] patched [PAWN_possessive] own injuries, as few would approach [PAWN_objective] for fear of friendly fire. Unfortunately, the cocktail of painkillers, uppers, aphrodisiacs, and so on that enabled [PAWN_nameDef]s rampages have dulled [PAWN_possessive] brain.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: tribal vorrior
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a courageous tribal bellavore. Unlike those drug-addled voreserkers, [PAWN_nameDef] kept [PAWN_possessive] mind focused and alert as [PAWN_pronoun] wove between blades and arrows to devour an enemy in strictly hand-to-hand combat. Back home, the band of vorriors would have their needs catered to by the youngbloods in their ranks.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: digesticutioner
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The laws of [PAWN_nameDef]'s home specifically prohibited any "inhumane" form of execution. The only death sentence not considered inhumane under this code was digestion. [PAWN_possessive] body ended the lives of many prisoners, and after a while, [PAWN_pronoun] found it much easier to ignore their pleas and bargains in favor of the satisfaction of [PAWN_possessive] hunger.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: well-fed jester
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In addition to all the normal things a jester might be asked to do--juggle, tell jokes, critique battle plans--[PAWN_nameDef] was also kept around the court as a pet, to whom any visitor that displeased [PAWN_possessive] master was fed.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: predatory peacekeeper
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] kept the peace in a recently-annexed region, suppressing the last embers of rebellion. [PAWN_pronoun] took special pleasure in churning malcontents into martyrs, even if they didnt leave much evidence behind to indicate their guilt once theyd passed through [PAWN_possessive] body.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: professor of predation
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] taught aspiring predators how to pred at an obscure yet prestigious university. While the faculty were discouraged from eating students willy-nilly, everyone--teachers included--were on the menu. Plenty of star students who got cocky and thought they could take on their teacher found the tables turned and their bodies melted away in [PAWN_nameDef]s body. Theres a reason [PAWN_pronoun] was paid to teach.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: predatory professor
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tenured professor at a prestigious university. Despite [PAWN_possessive] assorted eccentricities, such as devouring failing students and the odd GTA, the administration wouldnt dream of firing [PAWN_nameDef], no matter how many complaints they got.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: marauding circus performer
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed for a sketchy traveling circus, which relied extensively on audience volunteers. [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] coworkers would stuff themselves with dubiously-willing volunteers and perform great feats of agility and balance. By the time anyone realized those volunteers hadnt come back, the circus had already left.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: hungry hypnotist
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a pred-inclined pacifist, [PAWN_nameDef] was always in a tricky position. The longer [PAWN_pronoun] stayed in one place, the harder it got to find a willing meal. Hypnosis helped pressure the ones who suppressed their preyish desires, but it wasnt until [PAWN_pronoun] started channeling [PAWN_possessive] latent psychic powers into the practice, that [PAWN_nameDef] could dine on any patient [PAWN_pronoun] wanted, given enough sessions.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: munchy magician
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Making someone disappear is a classic magic trick, if a bit unimaginative. Likewise, using vore to do it is the next step for such unambitious magicians. Perhaps predictably, the audience members who'd volunteer to come up to the blindingly-lit stage and enter that dark wooden box with [PAWN_nameDef] would disappear a little more permanently than expected.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: sketchy vornstar pred
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] starred in illicit vornagraphy as a predator. Supposedly it was all fake, and just edited to look real, but [PAWN_possessive] fans noticed the shoots never starred the same prey actors twice, and [PAWN_nameDef] would put on weight after shoots...

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: edacious assassin
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an assassin with very particular methods. [PAWN_pronoun] differentiated [PAWN_objective]self from all the other cutthroats, by never cutting any throats at all. The way [PAWN_pronoun] saw it, throats werent for cutting; they were for swallowing: swallowing [PAWN_possessive] targets, swallowing any witnesses, swallowing any contractees who refused to pay up.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: black widower
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] moved from settlement to settlement, taking and wedding a new lover in each one. But, without fail, after just a few weeks of marriage, [PAWN_possessive] spouse would always suddenly disappear, [PAWN_nameDef] would put on some weight, and, after exhausting [PAWN_possessive] inheritance, [PAWN_pronoun] would move somewhere new.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: bluebeard
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_nameDef] built [PAWN_possessive] own house, [PAWN_pronoun] sought a spouse to share it with. Unfortunately, [PAWN_nameDef]s spouses had a habit of disappearing without a trace. What confounded investigators and kept [PAWN_nameDef] on the right side of the law is, typically, bluebeards hide the body somewhere in the house, or at least somewhere in the local area, but no trace of [PAWN_possessive] lovers could ever be found. Incidentally, it appeared [PAWN_nameDef] dealt with grief by overeating, judging by the weight put on after every disappearance.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: carnivorous clown
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] got a degree at the only college that would take [PAWN_objective]--a clown college--and set about making the best of [PAWN_possessive] few actual skills. [PAWN_pronoun] didnt even qualify for a troupe and had to settle on being an independent party clown. However, every party to which [PAWN_nameDef] was hired, one of the guests was sure to disappear.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: churning courtesan
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a dignified courtesan of the noble courts, attending to the digestive needs of high society. More often than not, [PAWN_pronoun] was paid not to churn [PAWN_possessive] client, but a rival lured into a trap, or some undesirable no one would miss. Sometimes, [PAWN_pronoun] even had to take down [PAWN_possessive] prey [PAWN_objective]self, with [PAWN_possessive] wits and a hidden weapon. However, brushing elbows with high society has made [PAWN_objective] picky about doing more conventional sorts of dirty work.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: garbage disposal
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a valued asset to a large and powerful urbworld gang. [PAWN_pronoun] had achieved [PAWN_possessive] standing by offering [PAWN_possessive] services as a different sort of cleaner: any captives, witnesses, incorruptible officials, or disloyal members the gang had? Just send them down [PAWN_possessive] gullet.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: hungry hitman
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a corporate hitman, trained in all manner of infiltration techniques--but only one method of elimination. [PAWN_possessive] weapon of choice was whichever hole was handy. Of course, sometimes holes arent handy. Thus [PAWN_pronoun] knew how to shoot a fleeing target in the legs to knock them down for consumption, or dose [PAWN_possessive] quarrys food with aphrodisiac and lull the target directly into [PAWN_nameDef]s open mouth. Above all, though, [PAWN_nameDef] left no trace of [PAWN_possessive] deeds.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: insatiable innkeeper
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] built and ran an inn along an occasionally-travelled road. It was the only place to rest for hours, either way, so just about every traveller heading therealong stopped by. This allowed [PAWN_objective] to have [PAWN_possessive] pick of sleeping and often solitary travellers for a midnight snack.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: plutophage
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took the phrase eat the rich very literally. Whenever [PAWN_pronoun] gets the opportunity to dine on the rich and powerful, and get rid of one of societys parasites, [PAWN_pronoun] takes it. Its just a matter of getting away with it.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: predacious pirate captain
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the captain of a pirate starship, raiding cargo haulers and pillaging space stations. While the loot was nice, and bossing [PAWN_possessive] crew around was fun, nothing quite compared to filling out [PAWN_possessive] own booty with those captured in their raids.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: hungry butler
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a servant for many rich families, but never for very long. After ingratiating [PAWN_objective]self with the family, learning all the codes to their safes and where they keep the good wine, [PAWN_pronoun] would sneakily clean up every single member of the household and staff before fencing their valuables and moving to a new city.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: insatiable smuggler
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a smuggler of the stars, skipping from system to system to collect and deliver all manner of packages too personal or clandestine to be sent through the Intersystem delivery corps. It was a lonely job, so [PAWN_pronoun] made sure to bring a passenger or two along. However, unless they were paying well, the only destination those passengers ever reached was [PAWN_possessive] hips. Any remains or unwanted possessions would be shot out the waste chute.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: serial predator
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] stalked the streets like a hunting ground, preying indiscriminately on the masses to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] hunger and lust. Countless hapless victims have disappeared, leaving nothing behind, into any hole [PAWN_pronoun] felt like filling that day. [PAWN_pronoun] has no desire to stop any time soon.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: voregilante
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a vigilante with a very punitive sense of justice. As self-elected judge, jury, and executioner, any criminal [PAWN_pronoun] got [PAWN_possessive] hands on was guaranteed to receive the death sentence in [PAWN_possessive] belly.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: apocalyptic survivore
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef]s homeworld came crashing down around [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_possessive] quality of life plummeted sharply. [PAWN_pronoun] did what it took to survive, awakening a voracious, predatory impulse in [PAWN_objective]self which [PAWN_possessive] former cushy lifestyle had suppressed.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: castaway survivore
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The vessel carrying [PAWN_nameDef] hit bad weather and crashed upon a deserted island, far from any shore. A quadrum or two later, a passing ship noted the campfire and sent its crew over to investigate. There they found, to their shock, a surprisingly healthy [PAWN_nameDef] and no sign of any of the other passengers, except for far more improvised shelter than [PAWN_pronoun] could have possibly needed.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: cave-in survivore
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trapped when the mine [PAWN_pronoun] toiled in collapsed, trapping [PAWN_objective] and dozens of other miners. Both sides of the cave-in toiled day and night to clear the rubble, but halfway through excavation, the sound of picks on the inside died down to just one. When the barrier was finally broken, they only found [PAWN_nameDef] digging away, alive and surprisingly healthy.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: crash survivore
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]s spaceship fell from the sky over an animal world, where humans had yet to colonize. When a large carnivore decided to take a bite out of one of [PAWN_possessive] compatriots hunting for food, it awakened something in [PAWN_nameDef] that urged [PAWN_objective] to do the same. Throughout the repair process, [PAWN_nameDef] devoured all of [PAWN_possessive] humanoid companions and took off alone, drooling at the opportunity to try what the animal kingdom taught [PAWN_objective] on the rest of the solar system.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: cryptawoken survivore
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a colonization program and entered a Cryptosleep Pod for a long journey. Unfortunately, the navigation system malfunctioned, and [PAWN_nameDef] woke up alone and way off course. Once the emergency food left around for just this purpose ran out, however, it was with some hesitation (weakened by maddening loneliness and hunger) that [PAWN_pronoun] turned to the other kind of meals, while [PAWN_pronoun] fixed the ship and located a new world to land on, with whoever, if anyone, remained.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: siege survivore
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trapped in a city under an unending siege. As the granaries ran empty and [PAWN_possessive] stomach rumbled louder and louder, [PAWN_nameDef] submitted to [PAWN_possessive] forbidden temptations and began to prey upon those whod fallen weak with hunger. When the remaining watchmen finally gave in and opened the gates to the army outside, [PAWN_nameDef] used that preserved strength to slip away unapprehended.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: endo art model
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an acrobat who pulled off great feats of voracity, strength, and acrobatics, all while laden down with up to ten other performers and even volunteers from [PAWN_possessive] audience, before safely letting them out back on the ground--or even into the waiting maw of another performer--dizzy, but alive.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: endo art model
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an artists model specializing in modeling the form of [PAWN_possessive] body while a whole live person was inside. After the session, [PAWN_pronoun] would let [PAWN_possessive] belly-stuffer out and see what the artist(s) had made.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: easygoing call-plaire
RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a vore prostitute--a call-pred, but a specific kind of call-pred known as a call-plaire--who sold access to [PAWN_possessive] insides for individual clients and groups to pleasure themselves in before being let out after a while. Since [PAWN_nameDef] granted access to every hole on [PAWN_possessive] body, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to make money from multiple concurrent clients.

RimVore2.RV2_BackstoryDef.title: roleplaying call-plaire
